languages.text:
Не забывайте повышать уровень персонажа и спутников — с развитием они получают новые {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланты{/g}, а также развивают {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыки{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g}.
Когда у персонажа появится возможность повысить уровень, в меню по кнопке {console_bind|RightBottom} появится соответствующий пункт.

traits.locale_text:
Не забывайте повышать уровень персонажа и спутников — с развитием они получают новые способности и получают новые таланты, а также развивают навыки и характеристики.
Когда у персонажа появится возможность повысить уровень, в сервисном меню появится соответствующий пункт.

languages.text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text:
Не забывайте повышать уровень персонажа и спутников — с развитием они получают новые {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланты{/g}, а также развивают {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыки{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g}.
Когда у персонажа появится возможность повысить уровень, в меню по кнопке {console_bind|RightBottom} появится соответствующий пункт.

traits.locale_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new abilities and talents and improve their skills and characteristics.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new abilities and talents and improve their skills and characteristics.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text:
No te olvides de potenciar el nivel de tu personaje y sus compañeros. Todos ellos reciben nuevas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} constantemente, además de mejorar sus {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.
Cuando un personaje está listo para potenciar su nivel, aparecerá la opción correspondiente en el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
No te olvides de potenciar el nivel de tu personaje y sus compañeros. Todos ellos reciben nuevas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} constantemente, además de mejorar sus {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} y características.
Cuando un personaje está listo para potenciar su nivel, aparecerá la opción correspondiente en el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text:
キャラクターとその仲間のレベルを上げることを忘れないようにしよう。新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}を身につけ、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を向上させることができる。
キャラクターが次のレベルに進む準備ができたら、クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}に対応するオプションが表示される。
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
キャラクターとその仲間のレベルを上げることを忘れないようにしよう。新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}を身につけ、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}と特性を向上させることができる。
キャラクターが次のレベルに進む準備ができたら、クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}に、対応するオプションが表示される。

languages.text:
别忘了提高您的角色与伙伴的等级，升级可以解锁新的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与新的{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，同时提高{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}修正值与各种{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}。
当您的角色可以升级的时候，相应选项会出现在快速访问窗口中，按下{console_bind|RightBottom}即可快速打开。
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
别忘了提高您的角色与伙伴的等级，升级可以解锁新的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与新的{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，同时提高{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}修正值与各种属性。
当您的角色可以升级的时候，相应选项会出现在快速访问窗口中，按下{console_bind|RightBottom}即可打开。

languages.text:
Denke daran, die Stufe deines Charakters und seiner Gefährten zu erhöhen – sie erhalten immer neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und verbessern ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.
Wenn ein Charakter bereit ist, in die nächste Stufe aufzusteigen, erscheint die entsprechende Option im Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
Denke daran, die Stufe deines Charakters und seiner Gefährten zu erhöhen – sie erhalten immer neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und verbessern ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} und Eigenschaften.
Wenn ein Charakter bereit ist, in die nächste Stufe aufzusteigen, erscheint die entsprechende Option im Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text:
N'oubliez pas d'améliorer le niveau de votre personnage et de ses compagnons. Ils reçoivent continuellement de nouvelles {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et de nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} et améliorent leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}.
Lorsqu'un personnage est prêt à passer au niveau suivant, l'option correspondante apparaît dans l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text:
N'oubliez pas d’améliorer le niveau de votre personnage et de ses compagnons. Ils reçoivent toujours de nouvelles {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et de nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} et améliorent leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} et caractéristiques.
Lorsqu'un personnage est prêt à passer au niveau suivant, l'option correspondante apparaît dans l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text:
Karakterin ile yoldaşlarına seviye atlatmayı unutma. Kazandıkları her seviye ile beraber yeni {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceriler{/g} edinir, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerini{/g} geliştirirler.
Bir karakter seviye atlamaya hazır olduğunda, ilgili seçenek hızlı erişimde {console_bind|RightBottom} görünecektir.
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
When a character is ready to advance to the next level, the corresponding option will appear in quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.
